snippet: Maoist rebels on Thursday released an Italian tourist guide abducted more than a month ago in eastern India after the state government agreed to release five rebels from prison.
abstract: Maoist rebels in the eastern Indian state of Orissa release an Italian tourist guide who has been held for over a month after the state government agrees to release five rebels from prison.
lead_paragraph: Maoist rebels on Thursday released an Italian tourist guide abducted more than a month ago in eastern India after the state government agreed to release five rebels from prison.
